name: RunRemoteShellCommandsSSH
description: Run shell commands on a remote machine using SSH.
author: Microsoft Corporation
instanceNameFormat: Run shell commands on remote machine using SSH

inputs.name: hostname
inputs.label: Hostname
inputs.helpMarkDown: Hostname or IP of the remote machine.

inputs.name: port
inputs.label: Port number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Port number on the remote machine to use for connecting.

inputs.name: username
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Username to connect to the remote machine.

inputs.name: password
inputs.label: Password/Passphrase
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the admin password or the passphrase to the private key if using SSH keys.

inputs.name: privateKey
inputs.label: Private Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide entire contents of the private key file.

inputs.name: commands
inputs.label: Commands
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the shell commands to run on the remote machine. Enter each command along with it's arguments on a new line.
